label: GS101: LoRaWAN® Gas Detector
description:
The GS101 is a LoRaWAN
® residential gas detector to detect the natural
gas leak and send alarms. When the concentration caused by gas leak reaches the preset threshold, the detector will trigger both LED light alarm and buzzer sound alarm, it also supports controlling outputs to close the gas valve and open the vent fans top revent potential accidents.
